name: Superfetch Dog
storyline:
Gale is a good boy.
Gale will fetch the orb for his little master.
The little master needs the orb.
Nothing can stop a good boy like Gale.
Gale is a good boy.
summary:
Play fetch as Gale the goodest boy.

Superfetch Dog a platformer where you need to fetch the orb for your owner. Run across various landscapes, jump over obstacles, climb trees, bark at small creatures, avoid dangerous wildlife, learn new tricks… Do anything you can to retrieve the orb before it’s too late!

Nothing can stop a good boy like Gale.
